name: Beat Attack (itch)
description:
Controls:

  • Player 1 - Space
  • Player 2 - Enter

Beat Attack is a musical versus puzzle brawler for two players.

We loved Tetris Attack, Puzzle Fighter, Puyo Puyo, and wanted a game that was just as brutal and played well on the super-portable tablet format. Kick your friend's ass anywher? YES PLEASE!

----------------------------

Beat Attack is in alpha currently. Tell us us you think of it!
